name: Maldives
description: The Maldives, known for its crystal clear waters and luxurious resorts, is a tropical paradise offering an ideal escape for relaxation and adventure. Ideal for honeymoons and family vacations.

packages.name: Luxury Beach Resort Package
packages.description: Experience 5-star luxury at a private beach resort with full board meals and water activities.
packages.inclusions: All meals, airport transfer, water sports, and spa treatments

packages.name: Budget Beach Bungalow
packages.description: Stay in a cozy beach bungalow with a half-board meal plan and enjoy water sports and excursions.
packages.inclusions: Breakfast, dinner, snorkeling gear, and one guided tour

activities.name: Snorkeling
activities.description: Explore the beautiful coral reefs around the island.

activities.name: Diving
activities.description: Dive deep into the crystal-clear waters to explore underwater life.

activities.name: Island Hopping
activities.description: Visit nearby islands and explore local culture.

attractions.name: Banana Reef
attractions.description: A world-famous reef known for diving and snorkeling, featuring vibrant coral and marine life.

attractions.name: HP Reef
attractions.description: Another fantastic spot for diving and underwater exploration, known for its stunning coral gardens.

attractions.name: Vaadhoo Island - Sea of Stars
attractions.description: Famous for its bioluminescent beach, where glowing plankton lights up the water at night, creating a 'Sea of Stars.'

attractions.name: The Maldives Glowing Beach
attractions.description: A mesmerizing natural phenomenon where the shoreline glows bright blue due to bioluminescent plankton.

attractions.name: Manta Point
attractions.description: Dive with majestic manta rays at one of the top diving sites in the Maldives.

reviews.comment: Amazing experience! Highly recommend the Maldives for a luxury vacation.
Beautiful scenery and fantastic service. The snorkeling was the best part!

name: Switzerland
description: Switzerland offers breathtaking mountain landscapes, luxurious cities, and adventure activities such as skiing and hiking. Perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers.

packages.name: Alpine Ski Adventure
packages.description: Experience skiing in the Swiss Alps, complete with ski passes, guided tours, and luxury lodging.
packages.inclusions: Ski passes, accommodation, and guided tours of the Alps

packages.name: Luxury Zurich Getaway
packages.description: Stay in a luxury hotel in Zurich and explore the city’s culture, shopping, and dining.
packages.inclusions: Luxury hotel stay, daily breakfast, and city tours

activities.name: Skiing
activities.description: Enjoy skiing down the breathtaking Swiss Alps.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Explore beautiful mountain trails with incredible views.

activities.name: City Tour
activities.description: Discover Zurich’s cultural highlights and luxury shopping.

attractions.name: Matterhorn
attractions.description: One of the most famous mountains in the world.

attractions.name: Lake Geneva
attractions.description: A stunning lake surrounded by mountains.

attractions.name: Château de Chillon
attractions.description: A medieval fortress set on Lake Geneva’s shores, offering stunning views and rich history.

attractions.name: Jungfraujoch
attractions.description: Known as the 'Top of Europe', this high-altitude destination offers breathtaking alpine views.

attractions.name: Zermatt Village
attractions.description: A picturesque village known for its luxury ski resorts and proximity to the Matterhorn.

reviews.comment: The Swiss Alps are an absolute dream. Incredible experience!
Zurich is a beautiful city, and the luxury hotels were outstanding.

name: Japan
description: Japan is a fascinating blend of ancient traditions and modern technology, offering unique cultural experiences and stunning landscapes.

packages.name: Tokyo and Kyoto Discovery
packages.description: Explore Japan’s rich history and modern culture in Tokyo and Kyoto with guided city tours and temple visits.
packages.inclusions: Guided city tours, accommodation, transportation between Tokyo and Kyoto

packages.name: Cherry Blossom Season Tour
packages.description: Experience the beauty of Japan’s cherry blossoms with visits to the best viewing spots.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, guided cherry blossom viewing tours

activities.name: Temple Visits
activities.description: Explore famous temples like Sensoji and Fushimi Inari Taisha.

activities.name: Sushi Making Class
activities.description: Learn how to make traditional sushi from a local chef.

activities.name: Sumo Wrestling Show
activities.description: Watch a traditional sumo wrestling match and learn about this ancient sport.

attractions.name: Mount Fuji
attractions.description: Japan's most iconic peak, known for hiking and breathtaking views.

attractions.name: Tokyo Tower
attractions.description: A symbol of Japan’s post-war rebirth, offering panoramic views of Tokyo.

attractions.name: Fushimi Inari Taisha
attractions.description: Famous for its thousands of red torii gates leading up to the shrine's main hall.

attractions.name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
attractions.description: A stunning Zen Buddhist temple covered in gold leaf, set amidst beautiful gardens.

attractions.name: Shibuya Crossing
attractions.description: One of the busiest pedestrian crossings in the world, known for its vibrant energy and surrounding shops.

reviews.comment: Japan is an extraordinary destination. The cherry blossoms were breathtaking, and the food was out of this world!
Loved the mix of old and new in Japan. The guided tours were excellent.

name: Australia
description: Australia is known for its diverse landscapes, from beautiful beaches and coral reefs to arid outback regions and bustling cities.

packages.name: Sydney and Great Barrier Reef Adventure
packages.description: Explore the vibrant city of Sydney and dive into the Great Barrier Reef, one of the world’s natural wonders.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, Great Barrier Reef tours, Sydney city tours

packages.name: Outback Explorer
packages.description: Discover the rugged beauty of Australia’s outback with visits to Uluru, Alice Springs, and more.

activities.name: Snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef
activities.description: Experience the vibrant underwater life of the Great Barrier Reef.

activities.name: Sydney Opera House Tour
activities.description: Take a guided tour of Australia’s most famous landmark.

activities.name: Uluru Hiking
activities.description: Explore the stunning red rock of Uluru in the heart of the outback.

attractions.name: Great Barrier Reef
attractions.description: The world's largest coral reef system, home to diverse marine life.

attractions.name: Sydney Opera House
attractions.description: An architectural marvel and one of the most iconic buildings in the world.

attractions.name: Uluru (Ayers Rock)
attractions.description: A massive sandstone monolith in the heart of the Australian outback, sacred to the indigenous Anangu people.

attractions.name: Bondi Beach
attractions.description: Famous for its golden sands and surf culture, Bondi Beach is a popular destination for sunbathers and surfers alike.

attractions.name: Great Ocean Road
attractions.description: One of the most scenic coastal drives in the world, offering stunning views of cliffs, beaches, and rock formations.

reviews.comment: Australia is a magical place! Snorkeling at the Great Barrier Reef was an unforgettable experience.
Loved exploring Sydney and seeing the Great Barrier Reef. The package was well organized.

name: Canada
description: Canada is a land of stunning natural beauty, from its majestic mountains to its peaceful lakes, making it perfect for outdoor adventures and city escapades.

packages.name: Rocky Mountain Adventure
packages.description: Explore the stunning Rocky Mountains with guided hikes, wildlife tours, and cozy lodges.
packages.inclusions: Guided hikes, accommodation, and wildlife tours

packages.name: Vancouver City and Nature Escape
packages.description: Discover the city of Vancouver and nearby nature spots like Stanley Park and Grouse Mountain.

activities.name: Whale Watching
activities.description: Go whale watching off the coast of Vancouver.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Trek through the beautiful trails of the Rocky Mountains.

activities.name: Snowboarding
activities.description: Enjoy snowboarding on world-class slopes in Banff.

attractions.name: Banff National Park
attractions.description: A stunning national park with beautiful lakes, mountains, and wildlife.

attractions.name: Niagara Falls
attractions.description: One of the most famous waterfalls in the world.

attractions.name: Whistler Blackcomb
attractions.description: A world-renowned ski resort offering a range of winter sports and stunning alpine views.

attractions.name: CN Tower
attractions.description: A major landmark in Toronto offering panoramic views of the city and beyond.

attractions.name: Prince Edward Island
attractions.description: Known for its picturesque landscapes, red sand beaches, and charming small towns.

reviews.comment: Canada is incredible! The Rocky Mountains are a must-see, and the wildlife was spectacular.
Vancouver was beautiful, and the whale watching experience was unforgettable.

name: New Zealand
description: New Zealand is known for its dramatic landscapes, from the snow-capped Southern Alps to lush forests and stunning beaches.

packages.name: Southern Alps Adventure
packages.description: Experience the majestic Southern Alps with hiking, glacier tours, and luxury accommodation.

packages.name: North Island Nature and Culture Tour
packages.description: Explore New Zealand’s North Island, including Rotorua’s geothermal wonders and Maori culture.

activities.name: Glacier Hiking
activities.description: Hike on the stunning glaciers of New Zealand's South Island.

activities.name: Bungee Jumping
activities.description: Experience the thrill of bungee jumping in Queenstown, the adventure capital of the world.

activities.name: Maori Cultural Experience
activities.description: Immerse yourself in Maori culture with traditional performances and a hangi feast.

attractions.name: Milford Sound
attractions.description: A breathtaking fjord known for its stunning scenery and wildlife.

attractions.name: Hobbiton Movie Set
attractions.description: Visit the famous movie set from the Lord of the Rings films.

attractions.name: Tongariro National Park
attractions.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with dramatic volcanic landscapes and hiking trails.

attractions.name: Rotorua
attractions.description: Known for its geothermal activity, Maori culture, and stunning lakes.

attractions.name: Queenstown
attractions.description: The adventure capital of New Zealand, offering activities like bungee jumping, skydiving, and skiing.

reviews.comment: New Zealand is absolutely beautiful! The Southern Alps were a highlight, and the glacier hiking was a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
The North Island was amazing. Loved learning about Maori culture and the natural beauty of Rotorua.

name: South Africa
description: South Africa offers a diverse range of experiences, from wildlife safaris to vibrant city life and stunning coastal scenery.

packages.name: Kruger National Park Safari
packages.description: Embark on a thrilling safari adventure in Kruger National Park, with game drives and luxury lodges.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, game drives, park entry fees

packages.name: Cape Town and Garden Route Tour
packages.description: Discover the beauty of Cape Town and the scenic Garden Route with guided tours and 4-star accommodation.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, city and Garden Route tours

activities.name: Safari Game Drives
activities.description: Experience thrilling game drives to spot the Big Five in Kruger National Park.

activities.name: Table Mountain Hike
activities.description: Hike to the top of Cape Town’s iconic Table Mountain for breathtaking views.

activities.name: Shark Cage Diving
activities.description: Get up close and personal with great white sharks in a safe cage diving experience.

attractions.name: Kruger National Park
attractions.description: One of Africa's largest game reserves, known for its incredible wildlife.

attractions.name: Table Mountain
attractions.description: A flat-topped mountain offering stunning views of Cape Town and the surrounding ocean.

attractions.name: Victoria Falls
attractions.description: One of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world, located on the border of Zambia and Zimbabwe.

attractions.name: Great Pyramids of Giza
attractions.description: The iconic pyramids in Egypt, considered one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

attractions.name: Serengeti National Park
attractions.description: Famous for its annual migration of over 1.5 million wildebeest and hundreds of thousands of zebras.

reviews.comment: South Africa was amazing! The safari in Kruger National Park was an unforgettable experience.
Cape Town is a beautiful city, and the Garden Route tour was spectacular.

name: Italy
description: Italy is a country of timeless beauty, rich history, and world-famous cuisine. From the canals of Venice to the art of Florence and the ruins of Rome, there's something for everyone.

packages.name: Rome, Florence, and Venice Tour
packages.description: Discover the art, history, and culture of Italy with guided tours of Rome, Florence, and Venice.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, city tours, transportation between cities

packages.name: Amalfi Coast Escape
packages.description: Relax along the stunning Amalfi Coast with its picturesque towns and beautiful beaches.
packages.inclusions: Accommodation, guided tours of the Amalfi Coast

activities.name: Vatican City Tour
activities.description: Explore the wonders of Vatican City, including St. Peter's Basilica and the Sistine Chapel.

activities.name: Gondola Ride in Venice
activities.description: Take a romantic gondola ride through the canals of Venice.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Tuscany
activities.description: Enjoy a wine tasting experience in the picturesque vineyards of Tuscany.

attractions.name: Kruger National Park
attractions.description: One of Africa's largest game reserves, known for its incredible wildlife.

attractions.name: Table Mountain
attractions.description: A flat-topped mountain offering stunning views of Cape Town and the surrounding ocean.

attractions.name: Cape Winelands
attractions.description: Renowned for its picturesque vineyards and exceptional wines.

attractions.name: Victoria & Alfred Waterfront
attractions.description: A bustling area with shopping, dining, and entertainment, offering views of the harbor.

attractions.name: Addo Elephant National Park
attractions.description: A park dedicated to elephant conservation, offering diverse wildlife experiences.

reviews.comment: Italy is breathtaking! The art and architecture were incredible, and the food was unforgettable.
The Amalfi Coast was a dream. Relaxing and beautiful – I can't wait to go back!
